text:
Iron Gaming | Atlanta, GA | Onsite | Senior Full Stack Engineer

Do you live to game? Are you ready to change the gaming world as we know it? Iron Gaming is looking for a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer to help bring our new product to market and beyond.

Stack: AWS, Heroku, Rails, Ruby, ReactJS, Redis, Postgres

Please contact cassie a/t irongaming d/o/t tv if you are interested.
